Package xtc.lang.cpp

This package implements the SuperC parsing engine for parsing all of C.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Actions.Context The context interface.
Stream Interface for a stream of tokens.
Syntax.LanguageTag The interface for language tags.
 

Class Summary
ActionGenerator This class generates a base class for semantic actions for a grammar.
Actions Support for semantic actions and parser context.
Builtins This class's purpose is to provide the built-in macros and system includes.
BuiltinsGenerator This class generates Builtins which stores the built-in macros and system directories of the current system.
CActions This class implements the generated CActionsBase class.
CActionsBase This class is generated from grammar annotations and provides semantic value and action support.
cdiff Token-based diff.
CLexerStream A stream of tokens from the C lexer.
ConditionEvaluator A visitor to partially evaluate conditional expressions that may contain both constants and free variable.
ConditionParser Packrat parser for grammar xtc.lang.cpp.Condition.
CParsingContext This class implements the generated CActionsBase class.
DirectiveParser Parses directives into compound tokens.
ForkMergeParser This class expands macros and processes header files

HeaderFileManager This class manages the lexing of input files as well as finding headers.
HeaderFileManager.Include This class abstracts away both a single header and computed headers that have to include several headers in different context.

SuperC The SuperC configuration-preserving preprocessor and parsing.

Syntax.EOF

Syntax.Text<Tag extends Enum<Tag> & Syntax.LanguageTag> A language token with variable text, such as identifiers and literals.
TokenFilter A stream that filters out all tokens except for regular and compound tokens.

Package xtc.lang.cpp Description

This package implements the SuperC parsing engine for parsing all of C.

SuperC Technical Manual

Please read the SuperC technical manual packaged with the source code. 
cd java/src/xtc/lang/cpp

# Depends on pdflatex
make manual.pdf
The manual's source is a latex file called manual.tex.

Quick Start

First setup the environment variables: 
# For bash
. java/src/xtc/lang/cpp/scripts/env.sh
Then run SuperC: 
java xtc.lang.cpp.SuperC program.c
Use -printAST to print the AST. Use -E to just do configuration-preserving preprocessing.
